text:
@BurgessOwens The death of GeorGe Floyd, albeit very wrong, cured cOVID-19 entirely. You can now gather in groups of thousands.

But that doesn’t count for church. Never church. You will not be allowed to attend church for at least another year. Maybe too.

domain.description: Named people in the world like Nelson Mandela
